title: AIMO Profile
description: Normative conversion profile mapping AIMO evidence/artifacts to an external framework (e.g. ISO/IEC 42001, NIST AI RMF, EU AI Act Annex IV). Used for validator profile conformance and coverage explanation.

target.description: Target framework or regulation for mapping.

target_version.description: Version of the target framework (e.g. 1.0, Annex IV).

source_object_ref.description: AIMO artifact or object reference (e.g. evidence, dictionary, Summary).

target_field.description: Target framework clause or field identifier.

required.description: If true, validator MUST ensure this mapping is satisfied by the bundle.
